title: 'its not musk at all....very intense fruity smell.'
body: 'its not musk at all....very intense fruity smell.'

title: 'Not worth the money...'
body: A very bad product from Yardley group. The fragrance not of Musk by any means, it's smelling like some cheap and downmarket deo.

title: 'Uniqueness'
column5: it feels half filled. Can I safely assume the contents are as shown and not less.'

title: Market as deodorant on Amazon but it's perfume
Horrible smell. May make you want to puke. Don't buy if you haven't smelt it before.
body: 'I don\'t know what Yardley were thinking when they made this! Doesn\'t smell anything like any other "Musk" deo or perfume. Of course
column5: I do realize that there might be some people who like this smell
column6: so my only suggestion is don\'t buy it unless you\'ve smelt it first. And just pulling off the cap to smell it won\'t work. You need to squirt a little bit on your wrist and be prepared to gag for several minutes.'

title: 'International and long lasting perfume'
body: 'Best perfume for daily usage .. suitable both for skin and clothes.. international musky fragrance with good retention. Must try'

title: 'Classy as the name says'
body: 'The musky note is mesmerising. Fresh new fragrance from masters of fragrance Yardley. No gas format with high dosage of perfume'

body: 'Ok but not really a male perfume. May be unisex'
